A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My TLDR review:  If you are a Star Wars fan you aren't going to like this movie.  If you more \"general audience\" you may enjoy it.  \n\nAs a standalone movie Last Jedi would be at best an average sci-fi film with decent action.  There are some plot holes and the comedy was a bit in your face\, so much so that it can take you out of the movie.  Within the existing lore established by the previous movies and countless other media this film simply doesn't work.  Two of the central messages of the film are all of the people you thought were heroes are actually failures and some people are simply irredeemably evil.
